page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A PUPIL
page.content: I am a pupil at the Marlborough School however, I am going to tell you about a typical Saturday. On Saturday, I get up early, scramble into my clothes, have breakfast and rush off in the car to catch the bus for music school. We have an amusing journey picking up people with their bassoons, clarinets, trumpets, double basses etc. When we get there, we pluck and puff ourselves silly, and sing away till we are exhausted. When I get home to my house in Kirtlington, I might go down to the lock or around the park for a walk. I do my homework varying, from English, History, Geography, Science or R.E. We then have tea and I watch my favourite film "Dynasty". Finally I go to bed. Georgina Sprake
